Name: paralytic poliomyelitis
Definition: A poliomyelitis that results in destruction located in motor neurons of central nervous system

Name: postpoliomyelitis syndrome
Definition: A poliomyelitis that results in atrophy located in muscle

Name: nonparalytic poliomyelitis
Definition: A poliomyelitis that results in destruction located in motor neurons

Name: obsolete recurrent Ewing's sarcoma
Definition: A poliomyelitis that results in destruction located in motor neurons

Name: geniculate herpes zoster
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in facial nerve
